snippet: American apparel prices, which fell rapidly early in this century and then stabilized, have begun to rise. The top two charts show consumer prices for apparel compared with late-1991 levels, and annual changes in the index. The fall in prices came as...
lead_paragraph: American apparel prices, which fell rapidly early in this century and then stabilized, have begun to rise. The top two charts show consumer prices for apparel compared with late-1991 levels, and annual changes in the index. The fall in prices came as the balance of payments deficit became extremely large, as shown in the bottom chart.

headline.main: Off the Charts: In Apparel, Inflation Is Back
headline.seo: Off the Charts: In Apparel, Inflation Is Back
